languages.text: "Твои тело и дух крепки несмотря на годы. Чем закаляешь ты их, Амик'Абеляр?"
"In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"
languages.original_text: "Твои тело и дух крепки несмотря на годы. Чем закаляешь ты их, Амик'Абеляр?"

traits.locale_text: "Your body and spirit are strong despite the years. What do you do to train them, Amic'Abelard?"
"Your body and spirit are strong despite the years. What do you do to train them, Amic'Abelard?"
"In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"
"In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"
"In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"
"In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"
"In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

languages.text: "Trotz Eurer Jahre sind Euer Körper und Geist noch stark. Sagt, Amic'Abelard, wie kräftigt Ihr sie?"
languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

traits.locale_text: "Trotz Eurer Jahre sind Euer Körper und Geist noch stark. Sagt, Amic'Abelard, wie kräftigt Ihr sie?"

languages.text: « En dépit des années, votre corps et votre esprit n'ont rien perdu de leur force. Dites-moi, Amic'Abélard, quel genre d'entraînement suivez-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

traits.locale_text: « En dépit des années, votre corps et votre esprit n'ont rien perdu de leur force. Dites-moi, Amic'Abélard, quel genre d'entraînement suivez-vous ? »

languages.text: «A pesar de su edad, su cuerpo y su espíritu siguen siendo fuertes. Dígame, Amic'Abelard, ¿cómo los entrena?».
languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

traits.locale_text: «A pesar de su edad, su cuerpo y su espíritu siguen siendo fuertes. Dígame, Amic'Abelard, ¿cómo los entrena?».

languages.text: 「年を重ねても、あなたの肉体と精神は丈夫なままなのね。教えて、アベラルド、あなたはそれらを鍛えるために何をしているの？」
languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

traits.locale_text: 「年を重ねても、あなたの肉体と精神は丈夫なままなのね。教えて、アベラルド、あなたはそれらを鍛えるために何をしているの？」

languages.text: “尽管你年事已高，但你的身体和精神依然非常强劲。告诉我，信者阿贝拉德，你是如何锻炼身心的？”
languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

traits.locale_text: “尽管你年事已高，但你的身体和精神依然非常强劲。告诉我，信者阿贝拉德，你是如何锻炼身心的？”

languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"

languages.text: "Geçirdiğin yıllara rağmen bedenin de ruhun da gücünü kaybetmemiş. Amik'Abelard, kendini nasıl zinde tuttuğunu anlatabilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "In spite of your years, your body and spirit remain strong. Tell me, Amic'Abelard, what do you do to train them?"
